Returns: An array of property names as described in the class documentation for @B_android#support#transition#TransitionValues_E@.
getPropagationProperties().Description: Returns the set of property names stored in the @B_android#support#transition#TransitionValues_E@ object passed into @B_android#support#transition#TransitionPropagation#captureValues_E@ that this transition propagation cares about for the purposes of preventing duplicate capturing of property values. A TransitionPropagation must override this method to prevent duplicate capturing of values and must contain at least one

ClassDesc: Extend TransitionPropagation to customize start delays for Animators created in @B_android#support#transition#Transition#createAnimator_E@. A Transition such as @B_android#support#transition#Explode_E@ defaults to using @B_android#support#transition#CircularPropagation_E@ and Views closer to the epicenter will move out of the scene later and into the scene sooner than Views farther from the epicenter, giving the appearance of inertia. With no TransitionPropagation, all Views will react simultaneously to the start of the transition.
